  • Method Details

    • newInstance

      public static Timer newInstance​(long timeout, Runnable onTimeout, boolean restartable)

      Default factory method for creating a new Timer object.

      Parameters:
      timeout - The timeout for the Timer, in milliseconds.
      onTimeout - The Runnable that is executed whenever the Timer times out.
      restartable - True if the Timer is to be restartable, false it is not.
      Returns:
      The newly constructed Timer instance.

    • newStopwatch

      public static Timer newStopwatch​(@Nullable @Nullable Runnable onTimeout, boolean restartable)

    • newCountdown

      public static Timer newCountdown​(Number timeout)
      Creates and then returns a new Timer that counts down from the specified timeout (milliseconds).
      • Number.longValue() is always used when determining the value used for the timeout.
      • A Duration can be used as the timeout to easily provide additional TimeUnit options.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The time in which the new Timer will count down from. Specified in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      The newly created Countdown Timer.
